Texto: 
abnormal eeg with left temporal lobe spikes.
surgical removal
• left posterior temporal lobe cortical lesion - 8 mm. and cystic appearing • no pathologic enhancement nor edema.
• lesion appears unchanged on mri pver three years.
dnet (dysembryoplastic neuroepithelial tumor)
• pleomorphic xanthoastrocytoma
• gangliocytoma
• ependymoma
• astrocytoma
• dnet
• cortical dysplasia
21 year old man with a three year history of epilepsy, with poor  seizure control.
no further seizures following surgery reported.
